My Life

My long journey on becoming a coder

I am an aspiring Web Developer eager to kickstart a career in the field. Proficient in python, HTML, CSS, and sublime text, with a foundation in responsive design. Currently learning and implementing modern frameworks such as React and VS Code. I am Enthusiastic about staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies. Passionate about creating user-friendly, visually appealing websites while continuously expanding technical skills.

My Journey to be a coder

Working at a charming cafe where I once found solace in the rhythmic hum of coffee machines and the aroma of freshly baked pastries was a journey filled with warmth and memories. Armed with my passion for photography, I embarked on a mission to capture the essence of this quaint establishment through my lens. Every shot was an attempt to immortalize the intricate latte art, the vibrant hues of the assorted pastries, and the cozy ambiance that enveloped the space. The act of uploading these snapshots onto the cafe's Instagram page felt like a gift to the loyal patrons and a virtual invitation to those yet to experience its magic.
